name: resabs1d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)), wss(c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wss(c2, c1), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wss(c2, c1), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c2, c1), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c1))

comment: Absorption law for restriction, deduction form. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
